title: Beckwith Ranch
text: The Beckwith Ranch is a historic cattle ranch in the <a href="Wet%20Mountain%20Valley">Wet Mountain Valley</a> of <a href="Custer%20County%2C%20Colorado">Custer County, Colorado</a>, USA. The headquarters spread over eleven buildings, ten of which have been listed on the <a href="National%20Register%20of%20Historic%20Places%20listings%20in%20Colorado">National Register of Historic Places</a> since May 20, 1998. It was established by Elton and Edwin Beckwith, two brothers from <a href="Mount%20Desert%20Island">Mount Desert Island</a>, <a href="Maine">Maine</a>.
